about_the_game:
"Let's cut to the heart of the matter: You're dead."

An otherworldly experience.


As a damned spirit, navigate through 7 unique worlds, each containing 5 levels of puzzles, platforming, and perforating hazards.
Place down your Spirit Gate, and return to it on a whim to navigate the increasingly labyrinthine platforming challenges.
Possess the humanoid and the formerly human; become a scarecrow, and scare crows (to death)!

A haunting tale of discovery and redemption.


An amnesiac spirit begins her new life facing Izanami, the goddess of death. Though she is spared from the eternal flames of Hell, she has been chosen by Izanami to undertake a series of brain-bending trials!
Who is this spirit, and why is she not in the heavens where she thinks she ought to belong?
A hellish ordeal awaits, but does a satisfying answer lie at the journey's end?

Master every level, and claim your rewards.


Each of the 35 levels contains a photobook scrap. Take the extra steps to collect them all, and you might be in for a surprise.
In the meantime, every level grades you on your speed; can you capture the coveted S Rank on every level?
Every scrap and S Rank obtained adds a new item to your damned spirit's wardrobe; be the best, and look good doing it!

Key Features:

  • 35 intense levels of platforming action!
  • 7 beautiful, hand-crafted worlds, including Izanami's Palace, Ne-no-Kuni and Mt. Fuji!
  • A ranking system to show off your mastery of the game!
  • A compelling narrative and engaging characters!
  • Steam Achievements!
  • Getting reprimanded by the heavens for killing too many crows!

name: Afterlife Reverie

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200, AMD Athlon XE BE-2300 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5500, Radeon R5 Graphics or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Display Resolution: 1024x576. Should realistically run on anything that can run Steam.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600k, AMD Ryzen 1600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050, AMD Radeon RX 460 or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: A challenging 2D puzzle platformer where a damned spirit must navigate her way through the Underworld and beyond in search of her past. Take over bodies and teleport your way to the answers you seek!
